wikipedia_page.main: Gavin Forsyth (born 4 July 1969 in Manchester) is a British former alpine skier who competed in the 1992 Winter Olympics. He has completed 1 Ironman and 3 half Ironmans a well as 7 marathons. He is an avid cross-country skier and road biker! He is the owner/operator of Clear Dental in British Columbia, Canada
